headline: Show HN: download all your [Liked] videos from TikTok for safekeeping
description:
This is a chrome extension I made. You visit tiktok.com and sign in, the extension retrieves MP4s and puts them in a folder.

My goal: the TikTok algorithm has helped me find wonderful things. I consider the list of my [Likes] to be a treasure collection, and want to make sure I don't lose them.

If you don't have time to try, here's a video walking through all the features: https://youtu.be/BoHOdRxHgP0

Is it free: Yes. (I did test a payment modal once, but users gave me 1-star ratings for it, so I removed it)
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 从TikTok下载你所有的[喜欢的]视频，以便妥善保存
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 從TikTok下載你所有的[喜歡的]視頻，以便妥善保存
description_zh-Hans:
这是我做的一个chrome扩展。你访问tiktok.com并登录，该扩展会检索MP4并把它们放在一个文件夹里。

我的目标：TikTok的算法已经帮助我找到了美妙的东西。I consider the list of my [Likes] to be a treasure collection, and want to make sure I don't lose them.

If you don't have time to try, here's a video walking through all the features: https://youtu.be/BoHOdRxHgP0

Is it free: 是的。（我曾经测试过一个支付模式，但用户给了我一星的评价，所以我把它删除了。）
description_zh-Hant:
這是我做的一個chrome擴展。你訪問tiktok.com並登錄，該擴展會檢索MP4並把它們放在一個文件夾裡。

我的目標：TikTok的算法已經幫助我找到了美妙的東西。I consider the list of my [Likes] to be a treasure collection, and want to make sure I don't lose them.

If you don't have time to try, here's a video walking through all the features: https://youtu.be/BoHOdRxHgP0

Is it free: 是的。（我曾經測試過一個支付模式，但用戶給了我一星的評價，所以我把它刪除了。）
